Transcript:
Alison: And that's how we're going to 
fight back. So, for just a few hours, we're going to pretend that creepy forces 
and evil vampires, they don't exist.
Rafe: They don't?

Alison: Yeah. Because all I want to 
feel and all I want you to think about -- I want you to think about me. I want 
to think about how sweet your kisses taste. And how good your hands feel on my 
skin.

Alison: Yep, and how the shivers run 
up my spine.

Tess: I am so glad you believe in me. 
This means so much, Jack. It means everything.

Jack: Well, if anyone can turn a bad 
heart good, it's you. So, I'll start doing things your way.

Tess: Well, thank you for having faith 
in me. You won't be sorry. Now, let's go into the bedroom, because I really miss 
you.

Jack: There's one errand I have to 
run, so, you go in there and get ready and warm it up for me.
Tess: Ok. I love you.

Jack: I love you. Hey, put some music 
on, too. You know my favorite.

Jack: I love you, Tess. Hope just one 
day you'll forgive me.

Joshua: So that charade in the woods 
-- that was just --

Caleb: Calling out the vampires? Well, 
to tell the truth, I was pissed enough to go through with it.

Joshua: But you didn't follow your 
original instinct, did you?
Caleb: You would have?
Joshua: We'll never know.

Caleb: No, we won't. Actually, I have 
Tess exactly where I want her. She thinks she -- she's changed me. That somehow, 
she's warmed my cold heart.

Josh: Then why don't you just pull 
Livvie out of Tess and be done with it?

Caleb: This task requires subtlety, 
finesse. Tess is fragile. Her heart, unprotected. It could be easily damaged.

Joshua: Are you sure it's Olivia that 
you want and not Tess?

Caleb: I was born to love Olivia. 
She's in my blood. Tess is just along for the ride. A means to an end.

Joshua: Then perhaps I can help you, 
now that I am stronger.

Caleb: Make no mistake. Just because 
you're one of us now doesn't make you equal. I don't need your help.
Joshua: I'm aware of my position.

Caleb: And never forget I can end this 
for you at any time.

Joshua: You have gone soft, Caleb. You 
think you know me? You have no idea. And by the time you find out, it'll be way 
too late.
Elizabeth: Tell me what you want.

Joshua: Is that any way to greet your 
new soul mate? You're agitated. What is it?

Elizabeth: I just need some of the 
water.

Joshua: There isn't any water here, 
and I prefer traditional feeding. Call me old-fashioned.

Elizabeth: You are not suggesting that 
--

Joshua: Elizabeth, we are vampires. 
It's what we do.
Elizabeth: Oh, God, not with you.

Joshua: Oh, do you see anybody else 
here in the room? Hello?
Elizabeth: I hate you.

Joshua: Who cares? I'm not 
particularly fond of you, either.
Elizabeth: No, don't.

Joshua: Your neck looks particularly 
lovely.
Elizabeth: Oh. No.

Joshua: Oh, please, just give in to 
it, Elizabeth.
Elizabeth: Oh. No. Oh. No.
Alison: You know what? It's gone.
Rafe: What?

Alison: The pit in my stomach that I 
had earlier. I just -- I started kissing you and I don't know where it went, but 
it's gone.

Rafe: I guess we should do this a lot 
more often, then, huh?

Alison: Mm-hmm, I think we should do 
this as often as we can.
Rafe: You know what else I think?
Alison: What?

Rafe: I think maybe I should take you 
out for some big fancy night out.

Alison: Are you trying to impress me? 
You're going to take me out on a date?
Rafe: Uh-huh.
Alison: Oh.

Rafe: Yeah. And I'm going to take you 
out for a, yeah, a big night on the town and then I'm going to tell you exactly 
what I want you to wear.

Alison: Oh, ok, we're going to do this 
game. Why do I have a feeling that it's going to be something short and sexy and 
something I'm going to have to have a --
[Alison gasps]
Rafe: I want you to wear this.

Alison: My ring! My God, it's my ring. 
It's so beautiful.

Rafe: I think it belongs back on this 
finger.

Alison: I have missed this so much. 
You have no idea.

Rafe: See, the thing is this ring, 
it's a promise. It's a promise that no matter what, no matter how bad things 
get, that we got a wedding to plan and we got -- we got happily ever after 
waiting for us right around the corner.

Alison: I will never take this off, 
never, never. Never. I promise -- never, ever. Ever. I missed it.

Alison: Oh! I have something for you. 
I almost forgot. I also have something for you, Rafe Kovich. Your watch again.
Rafe: My wedding gift. Thank you.
[Alison giggles]
[Pounding on door]
Rafe: Whoa, whoa! Hold on!
Alison: Wait. Rafe.
[Knocking]
Rafe: Ok, all right! Who is it?
Jack: It's Jack!
[Pounding]
Alison: Jack?
Rafe: Ok, Jack. Take it easy.
[Knocking]
Rafe: All right.

Alison: Hey, what is it? What's wrong? 
Is it Tess?
Jack: I set her up.
Alison: What?

Jack: Yes. She thinks she can heal 
him. And she's not going to stop, and I don't know what to do.

Rafe: Ok, all right, slow down. What 
did you do?

Jack: I lied to her. I told her that I 
believed that she could heal vampires. I supported the mission to save Caleb.
Alison: Oh, my God. Jack --

Jack: What the hell was I supposed to 
do, Alison? I just let her go -- go and let Caleb destroy her just like he did 
Livvie? He's going to destroy us. He's going to destroy us all if we don't do 
something. And I want you to know, I want to be the one that drives the stake 
through his heart.

Tess: Oh, Jack. How could anyone ever 
take you away from me?
On the next "Port Charles: Surrender" --

Alison: You're trying to keep Tess 
pure and innocent, and Caleb wants her to be the Livvie she used to be. You guys 
are pulling her apart.

Joshua: So why don't you just give in 
to it? Go on. Why don't you give in to me?
